sn2.8:1: Sāvatthinidānaṁ. Atha kho tāyano devaputto purāṇatitthakaro abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho tāyano devaputto bhagavato santike imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
sn2.8:2: "Chinda sotaṁ parakkamma,kāme panuda brāhmaṇa;Nappahāya munī kāme,nekattamupapajjati.
sn2.8:3: Kayirā ce kayirāthenaṁ,daḷhamenaṁ parakkame;Sithilo hi paribbājo,bhiyyo ākirate rajaṁ.
sn2.8:4: Akataṁ dukkaṭaṁ seyyo,pacchā tapati dukkaṭaṁ;Katañca sukataṁ seyyo,yaṁ katvā nānutappati.
sn2.8:6: Yaṁ kiñci sithilaṁ kammaṁ,saṅkiliṭṭhañca yaṁ vataṁ;Saṅkassaraṁ brahmacariyaṁ,na taṁ hoti mahapphalan"ti.
sn2.8:7: Idamavoca tāyano devaputto; idaṁ vatvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyīti.
sn2.8:8: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi: "imaṁ, bhikkhave, rattiṁ tāyano nāma devaputto purāṇatitthakaro abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā maṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho, bhikkhave, tāyano devaputto mama santike imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
sn2.8:9: ‘Chinda sotaṁ parakkamma,kāme panuda brāhmaṇa;Nappahāya munī kāme,nekattamupapajjati.
sn2.8:10: Kayirā ce kayirāthenaṁ,daḷhamenaṁ parakkame;Sithilo hi paribbājo,bhiyyo ākirate rajaṁ.
sn2.8:11: Akataṁ dukkaṭaṁ seyyo,pacchā tapati dukkaṭaṁ;Katañca sukataṁ seyyo,yaṁ katvā nānutappati.
sn2.8:13: Yaṁ kiñci sithilaṁ kammaṁ,saṅkiliṭṭhañca yaṁ vataṁ;Saṅkassaraṁ brahmacariyaṁ,na taṁ hoti mahapphalan’ti.
sn2.8:14: Idamavoca, bhikkhave, tāyano devaputto, idaṁ vatvā maṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi. Uggaṇhātha, bhikkhave, tāyanagāthā; pariyāpuṇātha, bhikkhave, tāyanagāthā; dhāretha, bhikkhave, tāyanagāthā. Atthasaṁhitā, bhikkhave, tāyanagāthā ādibrahmacariyikā"ti.
